text:
REMOTE | Austin, TX | Santa Barbara, CA | Full-Time

cielo24, Inc. is a software startup that delivers video data solutions that maximizes content ROI via a hybrid machine + human platform. We provide video intelligence (topics, keywords, captions, etc.) to clients in the entertainment, enterprise and online education industries.

We are currently looking for scrappy and versatile Python developers (Senior and Junior Positions available). The perfect candidate has strong software development methods and full stack versatility at scale, and excels in a smaller company environment.

Apply online here: https://cielo24.com/careers/senior-software-engineer/ https://cielo24.com/careers/software-engineer/
